verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Wednesday] , [ARG0: White House Press Secretary Sarah Sanders] [V: blasted] [ARG1: the " shameful " media] [ARG2: for being " out of touch " , " clueless " and not giving the Trump administration the credit it deserves] .
